mapper.select: select b.id,title,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,username,text,summary,type_name FROM Blog b,user u,blog_type t where b.state_id = 1 and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = t.id
select b.id,b.title,DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,b.summary,b.text,u.username from `blog` b,`user` u where b.user_id = u.id and b.id = #{uuid}
